amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for the Community Development Fund by $200 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Community Development Fund by $200 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A015) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A015) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
